subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Paul George scored 23 points and Roy Hibbert had 21, leading the Indiana Pacers back from a 7-point, fourth-quarter deficit for an 84-83 victory over the visiting Miami Heat.
snippet: Paul George scored 23 points and Roy Hibbert had 21, leading the Indiana Pacers back from a 7-point, fourth-quarter deficit for an 84-83 victory over the visiting Miami Heat.
